sentences.sentence: It was quite a big shop, with all the beautiful mahogany fitments that I now see in the antique shops.
sentences.translation: 店相当大，有许多现在我在古董店里看到的桃心木家具。

sentences.sentence: The fitments in our country have a lot of pattern and style. They are of Chinese style and Western-style, classicality style and modem style.
sentences.translation: 我国的家具品种及其式样风格是中式与西式互映，古典与现代共荣。
